about.title: About me
about.primary: I am a dynamic and dedicated frontend web developer with a passion for crafting visually appealing and intuitive user experiences. With a strong aesthetic sense and a keen eye for detail, I pride myself on creating websites that seamlessly blend form and function.
about.secondary: With expertise in cutting-edge tools and frameworks such as React and Angular. I'm able to to bring ideas to life, converting visions into interactive and engaging online spaces.
